title: Garlic prawn pâté in smoked salmon timbale
ingredients: ['100g butter', '750g raw prawns - peeled, deveined and tails removed', '3 garlic cloves, crushed', '1 teaspoon lemon zest', '3 tablespoons fresh lemon juice', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '2 tablespoons mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons snipped chives, or 1 tablespoon dried dill', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste', '120g smoked salmon', 'To serve', '16 whole cooked prawns, peeled but with tails left on (optional)', '2 lemons, quartered', 'capers or caviar (optional)', 'seafood sauce', 'melba toast']
